What.Business Summary: Cipher Mining Inc., together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates industrial-scale data centers in the United States. The company was founded in 2021 and is headquartered in New York, New York.

How.Business Model: Cipher Mining Inc., together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates industrial-scale data centers in the United States. The company was founded in 2021 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
